item.title: Plotting Datasets Using Jupyter, Pandas and Matplotlib
item.description: I'm new to exploring datasets, but I've already found some great public data online. First, can I say that Google Dataset Search is great? I have been enjoying many of the datasets I've found there. Additionally, organizations with public data like the Chicago Data Portal are interesting to check out …
